interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Splendora Sugar Lip Scrub - Peach - (20g / 0.7oz.)
Review Date: 2020/01/20
Store: Splendora
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Splendora', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '1.73 x 1.73 x 1.34 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '736640550444'}
Review Text: (Reviewed by my wife): This lip scrub smells great and tastes great.  You are supposed to rinse off the scrub after rubbing it in, but it tasted so good that I found myself licking the peachy sugar off.  The directions are very simple, just put a bit of scrub on your lips and rub them in for about 30 seconds, then rinse off.  My lips are visibly smoother after using this product.  The jar is small, but a little goes a long way so I'll be making this last.
Review Title: Smells great, tastes great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Body Scrubs for Women Premium Organic Nimiah Exfoliating Body Scrub with Activated Bamboo Charcoal Natural Salt Exfoliator Scrubs for Body Foot Hand Skin Care Nimiah {'Brand': 'Nimiah', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Use for': 'Hands, Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '2.7 x 2.7 x 2.1 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242919810'} Pros:

*The scrub is really good at exfoliating skin;
*After a week of daily use of this scrub, my skin is noticeably softer and brighter;
*It is kind of fun to use because it feels/looks like you are rubbing dirt all over your body;
*The jar is small but a little goes a long way.

Cons:
*The charcoal scrub is a bit messy if you are not careful. I have to quickly rinse my shower after each use because the stuff has flicked everywhere. Great scrub Way Of Will Sweet Orange Body Wash, Moisturizing Body Wash with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Body Wash for Women and Men, Paraben and Sulfate Free, 120 mL Way Of Will {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Oily,All Skin Types', 'Brand': 'Way Of Will', 'Scent': 'Sweet Orange', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben,Sulfate Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '840652000191'} (Reviewed by my wife): I did not expect to like this sweet orange essential oil body wash (It's orange!). It smells heavenly. The scent is a mood lifter as described. The body wash leaves my skin soft and smooth.

The bottle is surprisingly small, but a little goes a long way. Orange scent is heavenly Splendora Sugar Lip Scrub - Peach - (20g / 0.7oz.) You are supposed to rinse off the scrub after rubbing it in, but it tasted so good that I found myself licking the peachy sugar off. The directions are very simple, just put a bit of scrub on your lips and rub them in for about 30 seconds, then rinse off. My lips are visibly smoother after using this product. The jar is small, but a little goes a long way so I'll be making this last. Smells great, tastes great
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus:** The user remains committed to body care, with a clear emphasis on effective exfoliation for various skin areas, including the lips.
- **Skin Type Compatibility:** Expands interest to include products suitable for dry skin, indicating a broader approach to skincare that considers different needs.
- **Product Preferences:** Continues to favor organic materials and certified ingredients, reinforcing the preference for natural formulations. The user is open to products that enhance sensory experiences, as evidenced by enjoyment of appealing scents and tastes.
- **Effectiveness:** Values products that visibly improve texture and comfort, with emphasis on tactile experiences. Recently highlighted the importance of scent in enhancing mood and usability.
- **Practicality:** Maintains a preference for items requiring minimal product for maximum effect, valuing efficiency and longevity. The user appreciates that small-sized items can be very effective, as seen with recent purchases.
- **Usability Experience:** Offers balanced feedback on product functionality, underscoring a requirement for enjoyable and effective items. The user acknowledges that some products may introduce messiness but continues to seek user-friendly options that provide pleasing experiences.

Overall, the user prioritizes natural, well-performing skincare solutions tailored to specific needs, enjoys engaging olfactory and gustatory experiences, and values practicality and efficiency in their choices.
